argument.description: nvarchar(4000) value representing the formatted value to parse into the specified data type.
Literal value representing the data type requested for the result.
Optional string that identifies the culture in which string_value is formatted.

returnType: Returns the result of the expression, translated to the requested data type.
description: Returns the result of an expression, translated to the requested data type in SQL Server.
sample: SELECT PARSE('Monday, 13 December 2010' AS datetime2 USING 'en-US') AS Result;
